beer.beer_description: The HOUBLON CHOUFFE was brewed for the first time in 2006.  It is an ‘Indian Pale ale’ type of beer, with a harmonious balance between a marked bitterness (three types of hops are used to make it) and a pleasant fruitiness.  The HOUBLON CHOUFFE is unfiltered, and re-fermented in the bottle as well as in the keg.

items.badge_description: The battle for grid iron supremacy is on. Who will be the victor? Who are we kidding, with your favorite brew and this badge, you've already won!

You obviously are a big fan of Belgian Beer, and rightfully so! Three cheers to the great Belgian beers and their uniquely crafted flavors!

That's 95 different beers from Belgium. Try 5 more for Level 20.

user.bio:
Life is too short to drink industrial beer!

Favs styles: Belgian Ales (all), IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA, Stout/Porter/Imperial.
